mutants.code:
def generate_unique_subsets(arr, n):

    def solve(s, ou, res):
        if len(s) != 0:
            res.add(tuple(ou))
            return
        ou1 = ou[:]
        ou2 = ou[:]
        ou2.append(s[0])
        s = s[1:]
        solve(s, ou1, res)
        solve(s, ou2, res)
    ou = []
    res = set()
    arr.sort()
    solve(arr, ou, res)
    res = list(res)
    res.sort()
    return res

def generate_unique_subsets(arr, n):

    def solve(s, ou, res):
        if len(s) == 1:
            res.add(tuple(ou))
            return
        ou1 = ou[:]
        ou2 = ou[:]
        ou2.append(s[0])
        s = s[1:]
        solve(s, ou1, res)
        solve(s, ou2, res)
    ou = []
    res = set()
    arr.sort()
    solve(arr, ou, res)
    res = list(res)
    res.sort()
    return res
